SMSA Express
SMSA Express is a market leader in the courier industry. It boasts a solid business platform through which it have provided services to tens of thousands of businesses and individuals since 1994.
Since commencing business, SMSA Express has developed a range of services, including international and domestic express transportation, road, sea and airfreight, customs clearance, e-commerce solutions, special services for the health care sector, special delivery channel, mailroom management and many other services that qualify SMSA Express as the ideal logistics partner for prominent companies.
SMSA provides its distinctive services to numerous organizations and governmental entities, which depend on time sensitive service and security compliance. It is proud to serve businesses that demand a high level of care and quality.
SMSA Express, which, apart from its specialized logistics services, strives to meet the needs of citizens and businesses for domestic and international parcel delivery. SMSA Express has established a vast network that connects 230 countries together.
SMSA provides the best, most cost-effective, diverse express, freight, outbound and inbound shipping services available. In addition to SMSA’s parcel pick-up and delivery services, freight forwarding services, logistics services and tailor-made solutions, the operations are supported by a dedicated customs clearance department for clearing all incoming shipments either by air, road or sea.

title: About Us | SMSA Express
chunk_text:
parcel pick-up and delivery services, freight forwarding services, logistics services and tailor-made solutions, the operations are supported by a dedicated customs clearance department for clearing all incoming shipments either by air, road or sea.
SMSA Express is licensed to handle dangerous goods, accredited as an authorized shipping agency and licensed to transport via transit (TIR). It also received several quality certificates such as ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, OHSAS 18001:2015, as well as being awarded the “Best Company to Work for Certificate” award multiple times.

Storage and transportation of pharmaceutical products in compliance with the WHO Technical Report Series, No. 957, 2010, Annex 5: WHO Good Distribution Practices (GDP) for Pharmaceutical Products.

title: Blood Sample Services | SMSA Express
chunk_text:
es
Home
Case Studies
Blood Sample Services
Case Study Image
In the healthcare industry, speed is critical and sometimes it’s the difference between life and death. When caring for patients, only the highest standards within the shortest time will do.
In addition, there are other considerations that make the logistics even more challenging. Exact regulations have to be met when shipping vulnerable biological specimens. A logistics partner has to ensure the integrity of the contents from door to destination where every minute counts.
SMSA has the necessary, WHO-compliant equipment to move blood samples swiftly and in a tightly controlled environment delivering the package on time and uncompromised by temperature change or outside contamination.

Complaint Policy
Complaint Policy
Customer Complaint Handling Policy
SMSA aims to continuously improve the services provided to its customers. Effective complaints management is fundamental to the provision of quality services and provides the channels for obtaining feedback from its customers with the purpose of resolving disputes and reforming policies and procedures. SMSA is also committed to comply with the external government authority rules in case of escalation or disputes and reduce the financial and operational impact on the customer.
In the event that service quality standards are not met and the customer submits a complaint, SMSA is committed to settling the complaint in accordance with the internal policies and procedures of SMSA and in compliance with the laws, regulations and rules of the official authorities.
Complaint Handling Policy
SMSA has established a department specialized in managing direct or escalated customer complaints to the regulatory authorities.
SMSA customers have the right to file complaints, and the complaints management staff are committed to effective and efficient resolution of complaints or problems that may arise from the services provided by SMSA. The customer can view his rights in filing complaints by visiting the following link:
Terms & Conditions
Customer complaints are processed within a period of five (5) to seven (7) working days, unless the processing requires further additional procedures.
Complaints can be submitted through all customer communication channels by visiting the communication channels link:

title: Complaint Policy | SMSA Express
chunk_text:
ts are processed within a period of five (5) to seven (7) working days, unless the processing requires further additional procedures.
Complaints can be submitted through all customer communication channels by visiting the communication channels link:
https://www.smsaexpress.com/sa/contact-us
SMSA provides multiple channels of communication for the customer around the clock to inform him about the status of his complaint.
SMSA does not charge any fees when submitting a complaint.
SMSA is committed to the confidentiality and privacy of the complaining customer's data, and his data is not shared with any party, except for the official authorities and according to an official request.
The complaints management system included in this internal policy and procedures will be reviewed periodically (at least annually), with the aim of enhancing transparency and efficiency and achieving maximum satisfaction for SMSA customers. Our complaints management policy will always be available on our website:
https://www.smsaexpress.com/sa/contact-us

title: Download Mobile Apps | SMSA Express
chunk_text:
pps
The SMSA App allows all our customers around the world to track their delivery, monitor shipment progress and manage their account, addresses and delivery details. With the app you can manage your entire SMSA delivery experience using your phone.
Quickly and securely use your mobile number to sign-in and see all your shipments in one place. It is not necessary to have the tracking number at hand.
Get a full payment breakdown including delivery and customs charges, no unexpected surprises.
Get instant status updates and track your shipment’s progress from origin to final delivery.
Manage your account, including adding and editing multiple delivery addresses, using the in-app map and address details.
Manage your secure and personalized deliveries and choose a delivery to home or work at your preferred date and time.
Find and contact your nearest service center.
Calculate the rate of your upcoming shipment.

tudies
JAKDelivery
Case Study Image
Your smart, budget-friendly shipping buddy. We’re not just another delivery service. JAK is an AI-powered deferred shipping solution built for smart shoppers who love great deals but hate paying high delivery fees.
JAK is powered by SMSA, a trusted leader in domestic and international logistics. With a network spanning 230 countries, SMSA provides fast, reliable, and cost-effective shipping, supported by dedicated customs clearance and tailored logistics solutions.

Mailroom Services
Home
Case Studies
Mailroom Services
Case Study Image
In a growing business, managing mail consumes precious time; therefore, time is best spent elsewhere. Companies are bogged down with the running of mail handling activities, which are not revenue-generators and thus deemed to be unimportant.
Outsourcing a mailroom and reaping the benefits of increased efficiency and productivity is the best practice. This will allow companies to devote themselves to core activities that make the business successful; as well as, improves the quality service levels and guarantee reliable operations.
SMSA Mailroom Services is a cost-effective way to boost any company’s performance while retaining control at all times. SMSA is the first mailroom management service provider in KSA with ISO certification for its operations.

Freight

Services & Solutions
Freight
Freight
We’re built for big. Whether it is a few pallets headed to the next city or several truckloads bound for distant destinations, businesses from every sector know they can count on SMSA to move their large and heavy cargo. We offer much more than trucks and trailers, providing end-to-end freight logistics for your operation here and abroad. We love getting to know our clients in order to customize service to best meet their needs.
When serious cargo has to go, choose from our freight services:
Domestic Services
SMSA Freight Service Loose (SFS)
SMSA Freight Service Palletized (SFSP)
Trucking (LTL & FTL)
Cold Chain (LTL)
International Services
Air Cargo (Inbound & Outbound)
Sea Cargo (Inbound & Outbound)
Expedited Air Service
Brokerage Service
GCC Trucking (LTL & FTL)
Project Cargo Handling
Moving & Relocation Service
Cargo Insurance

We also offer industry-specific packaging solutions for homegrown products with unique requirements, such as olive oil, dates and honey.

Cold Chain
Home

Cold Chain
Cold Chain
No one likes a melted ice cream. Some things have to stay cold, however hot it gets on the road. SMSA’s Cold Chain Service is a state-of-the-art solution for transporting perishable items in a temperature-controlled environment. Whether it’s dairy, dates, cosmetics or some other delicious and delicate delivery, we make sure it arrives in its original cool state.
In fact, we guarantee your goods stay cold from end to end with specialist handling, continuous on-route temperature monitoring and airtight ISO thermal temperature-controlled passive boxes. Cold Chain handles more than food - our packaging, storage and rapid transportation across the country is suitable for any frozen or temperature-sensitive product, including pharmaceutical, biological/medical items, fragrances, cosmetics, and other consumer items.
Service Specifications:
End-to-end, temperature-controlled delivery anywhere.
Insulated ISO thermal temperature-controlled passive boxes of varying size.
Packing instructions (PI) and assistance (special packaging on request).
Continuous monitoring in transit (temperature reports upon request).
A reliable, nationwide network for fast temperature-control delivery (1-3 days business days)within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
Real Time Tracking.
A specially trained team for pick-up, delivery and handling this kind of sensitive shipments.
Tailored Service:  Medicines, Vaccines, Blood Samples, Biopsies, Chocolates, Pastries, And Organic Foods Etc.
Packaging Solutions as per WHO standard in

title: Automotive | SMSA Express
chunk_text:
ive
Home
Industries
Automotive
Automotive
Every component needs to be at the right place at the right time to avoid halts in production.That takes a swift, well-organized supply chain involving road and sea freight, and error-free customs processing.
SMSA is an experienced hand in solving the logistics puzzles that come with assembling vehicles. We can synchronize rapid delivery of multiple parts to a single location, ensure all international paperwork and regulations are properly handled and meet your heavy lifting, storage and automated shipping needs to boot.
When logistics are done right, you see a benefit to your bottom line with reduced costs and targets met. Speak with an SMSA Representative today and find out what we can do for you.
Service Specifications:
International and domestic freight – road, sea and air.
Customs brokerage and insurance.
Oversized or special cargo.
Storage solutions including warehouse and inventory management.
In-plant logistics and support.
Line-side feeding.
Integrated services for an optimized supply chain.
Fully automated ordering/shipping system customized to your needs.
Packing – consolidation, palletization, wrapping and returnable assets.
Pre-market customization (kitting and bundling).
Fast turnaround and competitive pricing.
Repair and return.

Aviation
A good logistics partner is key - they get critical pieces of your operation moving with optimum efficiency. Whether it’s raw materials, replacement parts or oversized ancillary equipment – it’s needed without delay and with utmost care in handling and storage.
At SMSA, we understand how safety demands and tight turnarounds make aerospace a uniquely challenging sector.We know that your supply chain is as complex as the precision engineering of your planes. We’re here to help.
We offer integrated logistics solutions that improve the flow of vital materials. We handle everything from over-sized, international freight to automated inventory and shipping software customized to your needs. Everything we do has one goal in mind – getting you off the ground and into the sky as quick as can be.
Service Specifications:
Extensive global network for international freight.
Handling of oversized, delicate and/or dangerous cargo.
Door-to-door, hold-for-pick up or drop-off service.
“Next-flight” urgent delivery.
Tracking in real time and online.
Storage, including warehouse and inventory management.
In-plant logistics and support.
Integrated services for an optimized supply chain.
Fully automated ordering/shipping system customized to your needs.
Packing – consolidation, palletization, wrapping and returnable assets.
Sub-assembly and kitting to speed up/simplify supply chain.
Fast turnarounds and competitive pricing.
Repair and return.
